remarks: Ordering relation for a monotonic sequence, increasing case. (Contributed by NM, 13-Mar-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Feb-2014.)
statement:
monoord.1 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) $.
monoord.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( F ` k ) e. RR ) $.
monoord.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... ( N - 1 ) ) ) -> ( F ` k ) <_ ( F ` ( k + 1 ) ) ) $.
monoord $p |- ( ph -> ( F ` M ) <_ ( F ` N ) ) $.
$d F k $.
$d M k $.
$d N k $.
$d k ph $.
